title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin calls out the Packers for being a soft team under head coach Matt LaFleur and QB Aaron Rodgers. He explains why Patrick Mahomes and Josh Allen are clearly the best rivalry in the NFL right now. He tells you why he was right about Kyler Murray and wrong about the Dodgers. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Sean Payton joins the show in studio to give his thoughts on Tom Brady missing Saturday's walk throughs prior to a loss on Sunday and if it matters for the 7-time Super Bowl champion at this point in his career. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
